title: Need Friends
body: Need friends to play with on league normals , hating playing by meself add me :)

replies.body: Sure, I need to get back into normal SR anyway. I'll add you on my main (SparksElm) too if that's OK.
Tried adding you but the client is saying your friends list is maxed out. Just thought I'd let you know.

I'm keen for this, it's the IP weekend too! (my account name is Chrystoff)
Edit1: Holy crap man, your friendslist is maxed out.
yeah sorry been working lately, yeah im deleting people i dont play with anymore
Just wondering but how many friends do you have to have for it to be maxed out?
hey, i just transferred from NA to OCE, i live in OCE, but played NA because i hate toxicity, im looking for a good group, preferrably with a teamspeak, to play normals and have fun :)
You can add me too I hate gaming alone too, my gamer name is "Inuyasha" :)
Add me, (Skorm94) im keen to play and earn bonus IP :D
